snippet: Quirke, a Dublin pathologist, returns for an encore in the latest novel by the Booker Prize-winning novelist John Banville, writing as Benjamin Black.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Vengeance by John Banville, writing as Benjamin Black.
lead_paragraph: Quirke, a Dublin pathologist, returns for an encore in the latest novel by the Booker Prize-winning novelist John Banville, writing as Benjamin Black.

headline.seo: ‘Vengeance,’ a New Novel by Benjamin Black
